              int width,
              int[][] cornerGrids,
              int[][] sideGrids,
              MyBrickusModel brickusModel)
               throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Initialize a piece.
        Parameters:
        height - Height of the piece.
        width - Width of the piece.
        cornerGrids - 2-d array of the corner grids.
        sideGrids - 2-d array of the side grids.
        brickusModel - The brickusModel the piece to be attached to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied(int x,
                 int y)
                   throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Determines whether or not this Brickus piece has a brick in the specified location of its grid.
        Specified by:
        isOccupied in interface edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2013.brickus.iface.BrickusPiece
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of this Brickus piece's grid.
        y - The Y coordinate of this Brickus piece's grid.
        Returns:
        true if this piece has a brick at that location; false if it does not. If the coordinate is out of bounds, the result is false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
